alert.note: Alert for Cattaraugus; Chautauqua; Southern Erie; Wyoming (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 10 at 6:35PM EST until January 11 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM EST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Lake effect snow. Additional snow accumulations of 3 to 5 inches in the most persistent lake snows. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph will produce blowing snow this evening, winds will then diminish overnight. * WHERE...Wyoming, Chautauqua, Cattaraugus, and Southern Erie counties. Greatest accumulations will be across the higher terrain of the Boston Hills, western Wyoming County, and the higher terrain in northern Chautauqua and Cattaraugus counties. * WHEN...Until 7 PM EST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on snow covered and slippery road conditions along with reduced visibility at times.
info.instruction: Periods of snow will result in snow covered roads and limited visibilities. Slow down and use caution while driving. Submit snow reports through our website or social media.
